DOC.brief_summary: This multicenter , observational study ass efficacy safety Pegasys ( peginterferon alfa 2a ) dual- triple therapy patient chronic hepatitis C. Patients receive Pegasys and/or ribavirin and/or protease inhibitor accord local guideline . Data collect 96 week .
DOC.brief_title: An Observational Study Pegasys Dual- Triple-Therapy Patients With Chronic Hepatitis C
DOC.criteria: Adult patient , > /= 18 year age Diagnosis chronic hepatitis C Patients receive treatment Pegasys and/or Copegus ( ribavirin ) and/or protease inhibitor accord local label Contraindications Pegasys Copegus Not willing unable sign write informed consent form
